poem:
Title: "The Echoing Cry"

In silence, shadows await the cold;
Echoes of life in Kharkiv vanish
Under the tread of the iron beast.
We draw our tears from the bitter deep -
In the blasted store, the crushed pharmacy.
Blood and breath of child, woman,
Unjustly taken, marked for sorrow.
Rains of steel fall, an evil harvest,
Yet Ukraine stands, undaunted still.
